scripts.build-default: node-sass src/packages/default.sass dist/iit-default.css --output-style expanded && node-sass src/packages/default.sass dist/iit-default.min.css --output-style compressed
scripts.build-default-with-components: node-sass src/packages/default-with-components.sass dist/iit-default-with-components.css --output-style expanded && node-sass src/packages/default-with-components.sass dist/iit-default-with-components.min.css --output-style compressed
scripts.build-default_cloud: node-sass src/packages/default_cloud.sass dist/iit-default_cloud.css --output-style expanded && node-sass src/packages/default_cloud.sass dist/iit-default_cloud.min.css --output-style compressed
scripts.build-all: npm run build-default && npm run build-default-with-components && npm run build-default_cloud && npm run build-grid-b4v1 && npm run build-grid-b4v2 && npm run build-grid-b4b3
